title: Breaking up a T3 Turkey Red set!!
author: T3s

posts.post_title: Breaking up a T3 Turkey Red set!!
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I've just started the process of breaking up a very nice low-mid grade T3 Turkey Red set.  Most of the cards are ungraded - so nice to hold them before they are sent off to be slabbed.  I'm only beginning to scan and price them, but if you are looking for a specific card or cards, or cards in a specific grade, please contact me and I'll get to work for you right away.  This is really a "collector grade" set and will be priced accordingly.  This is a perfect chance to pick up your first T3, fill a hole in your set or get a key Hall of Famer.  There are some very nice cards in the group as well and some will be sent to PSA for grading - unless you want to grab them first.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Thanks in advance for your patience, I am scanning as fast as I can.

Happy Collecting,
Craig

Hi Craig
Eventually I would like my type T3 to be Cobb. I doubt I have the funds now but have you thought of a price for him? I assume the back is clean....

I'd be interested in hearing about any of your Philadelphia examples.  Athletics or Phillies.

Mike

Hi Craig - I'm looking for a WaJo with the checklist back in an eye-pleasing VG or lesser condition.  If you have one to sell, kindly send scans to [url]ekehl333@aol.com[/url] when you get a chance.
Thanks,
Val

I would be interested in the NY Americans (Chase, Criger, Kleinow, Manning).

Please send scans and pricing info to [url]mcantista@gmail.com[/url]

thanks,
Mike
I'd be interested in seeing the Collins, Crawford, and Jennings.
I would be interested in a scan & price on the Jake Stahl. Thanks! Steve

Interested in a scan/price of the following.  Send to [url]r_dillingham@hotmail.com[/url]

Dahlen, Rucker, Lennox

Love a Price and a Back Scan of the Matty...

TIA...

As Always...

would like Scans and price for Bender and Joss

Hi Craig,

Prices and scans front and back of Cobb and Matty.

Thanks, Keith snoopy1955 at comcast dot net
